title: 708: I EXPECT BITCOIN TO PASS $1-2 MILLION EASILY BY THIS DATE, PREDICTS BTC VETERAN BOBBY LEE!!!!
description:
Crypto veteran Bobby Lee thinks Bitcoin will skyrocket in price by the end of 2021.

“I expect Bitcoin to pass a million, two million dollars easily in the next 10-15 years. In fact, the next cycle I predict to be in the year 2024 or 2025, and that’s when Bitcoin will cross half a million dollars and might even touch $1 million.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

content:encoded:
Crypto veteran Bobby Lee thinks Bitcoin will skyrocket in price by the end of 2021. “I expect Bitcoin to pass a million, two million dollars easily in the next 10-15 years. In fact, the next cycle I predict to be in the year 2024 or 2025, and that’s when Bitcoin will cross half a million dollars and might even touch $1 million.” For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
